162462.「フフ……。\n その姿 とてもよく お似合いですよ。\n<br>\n「ですが:
You look very good. However, if you want to get rid of the disguise makeup and go back to your original race, you can come back here as
many times as you like within the disguise makeup duration, and you can get back to the disguise makeup again.

162463.「……そうですか。\n それは 本当に 残念なことです。 \n 気が変わりまし:
...I see. That is truly unfortunate. If you
change your mind, please come again.

162465.「では 説明しましょう。こちらでは\n 仮装メイク道具という 特別な品と交換で\:
Let me explain. Here you can use my disguise makeup in exchange for a special Makeup Kit, a dream come true that will make your races look
like other races for a short time. The funny Dwarf becomes the cool Weddie. A nice-bodied, macho Ogre can become a small, cute Pukulipo!
Of course, this is only a temporary costume with Demon. Your true nature is still <%sM_real_race>. You can go back to your
original appearance as many times as you like, as long as the disguise makeup is still in effect, and you can disguise yourself again.
However, if you want to disguise your makeup again, you will need to get a new Makeup Kit. In that case, the disguise duration will be
extended by adding to the current remaining time. You can also change your hair style and other appearance in the Salon. And the next
time you disguise makeup, if it is the same races as the last time, the changes you made in the Salon will remain. ...That's all for
now. I hope you understood.

162466.「フフ……。\n 仮装メイクの延長を ご希望ですか。 \n そのお姿が お気に召:
Hmmm... you want to extend the disguise makeup? It seems that you like the way you look. However, in order to do so, you will
need to get a new Makeup Kit. In that case, the disguise duration will be added to the remaining duration of the new Makeup Kit.
Which Makeup Kit would you like to use?

162467.「フフ……。\n 仮装メイクの延長を ご希望ですか。 \n そのお姿が お気に召:
Hmmm... you want to extend the disguise makeup? It seems that you like the way you look. But in order to do so, you'll have to
give us another Makeup Kit. Well... unfortunately, you don't have a Makeup Kit right now... Please come back again after you
get a Makeup Kit. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

162468.「フフ……。では いきますよ。\n<br>\n「私の 仮装メイク術の冴え……:
Well, here we go. My disguise makeup is so
brilliant... just take a look!
<end>

162469.「仮装メイクを落として\n 元の種族の姿に 戻られるのですね。\n<br>\n「:
So you are going to drop the disguise makeup and return to your original race appearance. I understand. Then I will return you to the
appearance of the original race.

162470.「メイクの有効期間内であれば 選んだ種族の姿に\n 何度でも 仮装メイクすること:
You can disguise makeup as many times as you
want to the races you choose as long as the
makeup is valid. Please feel free to do so.

162471.<pc>の姿が 元の種族の姿に戻った！: <pc> has reverted to his original form!

162472.「フフ…… そうこなくては。 \n それでは まず ご使用になりたい\n 仮装:
Well, that's the way it should be. First of
all, please select the Makeup Kit you would
like to use.

162473.「あなたに ほどこした\n 仮装メイクの 効果時間は\n まだ 残っているようで:
It seems that your disguise makeup still has some time left in it. So let's reapply the make-up to your <%sL_KASOU_RACE> appearance
again.

162474.「……おや？\n あなたは 仮装メイク道具を\n お持ちではないようですね。\n:
...Oh? It seems that you do not have a Makeup Kit. Please get a Makeup Kit and come to our office. Please come to our office with your
Makeup Kit and we will be waiting for you.

162475.「フフ……\n 今とは 別の種族の姿に\n 仮装メイクしたいのですね。\n<br:
So you want to disguise your makeup to a different races. But in order to do so, you will need to get a new Makeup Kit. In that
case, the disguise duration will be the remaining duration of the current kit plus the duration of the new Makeup Kit. Which Makeup
Kit would you like to use?

162476.「フフ……。\n 今とは 別の種族の姿に\n 仮装メイクしたいのですね。\n<b:
So you want to disguise makeup to a different races. But in order to do so, you'll need to give me a new Makeup Kit. Well...
unfortunately, you don't have a Makeup Kit right now... Please get one and come back to our salon. We are looking forward to seeing
you again.

162477.「では どの種族の姿への 仮装メイクを\n お望みですか？ \n<break>:
So which race do you want to look like with
disguise makeup?
<break>

162480.「フフ…… はじめまして。\n 私は メイク術師マギダスと申します。\n<br>:
Hmph... Nice to meet you. My name is Makeup Cosmetics Magidas. I may look like this, but the truth is, I can use an interesting
technique. It's called disguise makeup. I borrowed this place because I want more people to know about this technique.

162481.「フフ…… お久しぶりですね。\n 私ですよ。メイク術師のマギダスです。\n<b:
Huh... It's been a while. It's me. I'm Magidas, the makeup artist. It's a pleasure to meet you again. It seems that you and I are
connected by a thread of fate. Actually... I decided to rent this place to let more people know about my disguise makeup.

162482.「仮装メイク術は あなたの種族としての見た目を\n すこしの時間だけ 別の種族に:
Disguise makeup is a dream come true that will make your races look like other races for a short time. The funny Dwarf becomes the cool
Weddie. The nice-bodied and macho Ogre can become the cute and petite Pukulipo. You can disguise your makeup as many times as you like
within the disguise makeup duration, and you can also disguise your makeup again. However, you will need to provide us with a special
Makeup Kit in order to perform the disguise. How about it? Would you like to look different?

162483.「フフ…… いらっしゃいませ。\n メイク術師マギダスです。\n<bw_brea:
Hehe... Welcome. I'm Makeup Cosmetics Magidas.
<bw_break>

162484.「フフ…… いらっしゃいませ。\n メイク術師マギダスです。\n その姿 とても:
Hehe... Welcome. I'm Makeup Cosmetics Magidas.
You look very nice.
<bw_break>

162485.「さて 本日は この私に\n どのような ご用件でしょうか？\n<break>:
Now, what can I do for you today?
<break>

in the "Explanation" section.

162498.「有効期間が 最大の９０日を超えてしまうため\n ９０日止まりと なってしまいま:
The duration would exceed the maximum of 90
days, so it would stop at 90 days. Is this
still acceptable?
<yesno 2><break>

162499.「<%sL_KASOU_RACE>の姿への 仮装メイク術の有効期間は\n <%n:
The duration of your <%sL_KASOU_RACE> disguise
duration will be extended to <%dL_DAY> day(s),
<%dL_HOUR> hour(s), and <%dL_MIN> minute(s). Is that okay?
<yesno 2><break>

162500.「おや……。あなたは すでに\n その種族の姿に 仮装メイク中ですよ。\n<br:
Oh well... you are already in disguise makeup
in that races form. ...So you would like to
extend the duration of disguise makeup?
<yesno 2><break>

162501.「ほう……。\n <%sL_KASOU_RACE>を選びましたか。 \n<br>:
Well... you have chosen <%sL_KASOU_RACE>. You can't re-select another races during the effect duration, but are you sure you want to
disguise makeup to look like <%sL_KASOU_RACE>?

166140.「おっと……。\n 残念ですが 仮装メイク術の有効期間を\n 過ぎてしまったよう:
Oops... I'm afraid the disguise duration has
passed.
